quiz.question: ______ prowess
quiz.explanation: 英勇, 战斗英勇. The warrior was famous for his battle prowess. 这位战士以他的战斗英勇而闻名。

quiz.question: _____ hiss
quiz.explanation: 嘶嘶声, 蛇嘶嘶声. The snake's hiss warned intruders to stay away. 蛇的嘶嘶声警告入侵者远离。

quiz.question: _________ amiss
quiz.explanation: 有问题, 有问题的事情. He sensed something was amiss in the quiet house. 他感觉到安静的房子里有问题。

quiz.question: crisscross _______
quiz.explanation: 十字交叉, 十字交叉图案. The fabric featured a crisscross pattern of lines. 这块织物有十字交叉的线条图案。

quiz.question: engross __ ____
quiz.explanation: 全神贯注, 全神贯注于工作. She was completely engrossed in her work. 她完全全神贯注于工作。

quiz.question: ____ concuss
quiz.explanation: 脑震荡, 头部脑震荡. The impact could concuss the player's head badly. 撞击可能会严重震荡球员的头部。

quiz.question: ____ _ fuss
quiz.explanation: 大惊小怪, 大惊小怪. Don't make a fuss over small problems. 不要为小问题大惊小怪。

quiz.question: ____ callus
quiz.explanation: 老茧, 皮肤老茧. A thick skin callus formed on his palm from work. 他的手掌因工作形成了厚厚的皮肤老茧。

quiz.question: ____ nonplus
quiz.explanation: 困惑, 使困惑. The strange question left him completely nonplussed. 这个奇怪的问题使他完全困惑。

quiz.question: bulbous ____
quiz.explanation: 球状的, 球状的鼻子. The cartoon character had a large bulbous nose. 这个卡通人物有一个大的球状鼻子。

quiz.question: raucous _____
quiz.explanation: 刺耳的, 刺耳的笑声. His raucous laugh echoed through the bar. 他刺耳的笑声在酒吧里回荡。

quiz.question: stupendous ____
quiz.explanation: 惊人的, 惊人的景色. The mountain offered a stupendous view of the valley. 这座山提供了山谷的惊人景色。

quiz.question: hideous _______
quiz.explanation: 可怕的, 可怕的怪物. The hideous monster terrified the villagers. 可怕的怪物吓坏了村民。

quiz.question: nauseous _____
quiz.explanation: 令人作呕的, 令人作呕的气味. The nauseous smell made everyone feel sick. 令人作呕的气味让每个人都感到不舒服。

quiz.question: dubious _____
quiz.explanation: 可疑的, 可疑的声明. His dubious claim lacked any real evidence. 他可疑的声明缺乏任何真实证据。

quiz.question: efficacious ______
quiz.explanation: 有效的, 有效的补救措施. The doctor prescribed an efficacious remedy for the illness. 医生开了一个有效的补救措施来治疗疾病。

quiz.question: gracious ____
quiz.explanation: 亲切的, 亲切的主人. The gracious host welcomed all the guests warmly. 亲切的主人热情地欢迎所有客人。

quiz.question: vivacious ____
quiz.explanation: 活泼的, 活泼的女孩. The vivacious girl entertained everyone at the party. 活泼的女孩在派对上娱乐了每个人。

quiz.question: precocious _____
quiz.explanation: 早熟的, 早熟的孩子. The precocious child could read at age three. 这个早熟的孩子三岁就会读书。

quiz.question: ferocious _____
quiz.explanation: 凶猛的, 凶猛的野兽. The ferocious beast attacked without warning. 凶猛的野兽毫无预警地攻击。

quiz.question: tedious ____
quiz.explanation: 乏味的, 乏味的任务. Filing paperwork was a tedious task. 归档文件是一项乏味的任务。

quiz.question: supercilious ____
quiz.explanation: 傲慢的, 傲慢的眼神. She gave him a supercilious look of disdain. 她给了他一个傲慢的轻蔑眼神。

quiz.question: rebellious ________
quiz.explanation: 叛逆的, 叛逆的青少年. The rebellious teenager refused to follow rules. 叛逆的青少年拒绝遵守规则。

quiz.question: ingenious ____
quiz.explanation: 巧妙的, 巧妙的想法. The inventor had an ingenious idea to solve the problem. 发明家有一个巧妙的想法来解决问题。

quiz.question: sanctimonious ____
quiz.explanation: 假装虔诚的, 假装虔诚的语气. His sanctimonious tone annoyed his colleagues. 他假装虔诚的语气惹恼了同事。

quiz.question: copious _____
quiz.explanation: 大量的, 大量的笔记. The student took copious notes during the lecture. 学生在讲座中做了大量的笔记。

quiz.question: devious ____
quiz.explanation: 狡猾的, 狡猾的计划. The villain hatched a devious plan to steal the jewels. 反派策划了一个狡猾的计划来偷珠宝。

quiz.question: oblivious ___
quiz.explanation: 没注意到的, 没注意到的男人. The oblivious man walked into the pole. 没注意到的男人撞上了杆子。

quiz.question: marvellous ____
quiz.explanation: 奇妙的, 奇妙的景色. The sunset created a marvellous view over the ocean. 日落在海洋上创造了奇妙的景色。

quiz.question: frivolous _______
quiz.explanation: 轻浮的, 轻浮的诉讼. The judge dismissed the frivolous lawsuit immediately. 法官立即驳回了轻浮的诉讼。

quiz.question: tremulous _____
quiz.explanation: 颤抖的, 颤抖的声音. Her tremulous voice revealed her nervousness. 她颤抖的声音显露出她的紧张。

quiz.question: ravenous ______
quiz.explanation: 贪婪的, 贪婪的饥饿. After the hike, he felt ravenous hunger. 徒步旅行后,他感到贪婪的饥饿。

quiz.question: heinous _____
quiz.explanation: 可憎的, 可憎的犯罪. The heinous crime shocked the entire nation. 可憎的犯罪震惊了整个国家。

quiz.question: ominous ____
quiz.explanation: 不祥的, 不祥的征兆. Dark clouds were an ominous sign of the coming storm. 乌云是即将来临的风暴的不祥征兆。

quiz.question: luminous _____
quiz.explanation: 发光的, 发光的星星. Luminous stars filled the night sky. 发光的星星充满了夜空。

quiz.question: glutinous ____
quiz.explanation: 黏性的, 黏性的米. Glutinous rice is used to make sushi. 黏性米用来做寿司。

quiz.question: mutinous _______
quiz.explanation: 叛变的, 叛变的水手. The mutinous sailors refused to obey the captain. 叛变的水手拒绝服从船长。

quiz.question: monotonous ___
quiz.explanation: 单调的, 单调的工作. The factory worker found his job monotonous. 工厂工人发现他的工作单调。

quiz.question: cavernous ____
quiz.explanation: 洞穴般的, 洞穴般的大厅. The cavernous hall echoed with footsteps. 洞穴般的大厅回响着脚步声。

quiz.question: ludicrous ____
quiz.explanation: 荒谬的, 荒谬的想法. The proposal was a ludicrous idea that nobody supported. 这个提议是一个没人支持的荒谬想法。

quiz.question: wondrous _____
quiz.explanation: 奇妙的, 奇妙的景象. The northern lights were a wondrous sight. 北极光是一个奇妙的景象。

quiz.question: murderous ____
quiz.explanation: 凶残的, 凶残的愤怒. He flew into a murderous rage when provoked. 当被激怒时,他陷入凶残的愤怒。

quiz.question: vociferous _______
quiz.explanation: 大声疾呼的, 大声疾呼的抗议. The vociferous protest could be heard blocks away. 大声疾呼的抗议在几个街区外都能听到。

quiz.question: treacherous ______
quiz.explanation: 危险的, 危险的水域. The sailors navigated treacherous waters carefully. 水手们小心地在危险的水域航行。

quiz.question: onerous ____
quiz.explanation: 繁重的, 繁重的责任. Caring for elderly parents can be an onerous duty. 照顾年迈的父母可能是繁重的责任。

quiz.question: boisterous _____
quiz.explanation: 喧闹的, 喧闹的人群. The boisterous crowd cheered loudly for their team. 喧闹的人群为他们的球队大声欢呼。

quiz.question: desirous ____
quiz.explanation: 渴望的, 渴望的眼神. She gave the jewelry a desirous look. 她对珠宝投以渴望的眼神。

quiz.question: traitorous ___
quiz.explanation: 叛国的, 叛国的行为. His traitorous act betrayed the entire nation. 他叛国的行为背叛了整个国家。

quiz.question: monstrous ___
quiz.explanation: 可怕的, 可怕的谎言. He told a monstrous lie to cover his mistake. 他说了一个可怕的谎言来掩盖错误。

quiz.question: rapturous ________
quiz.explanation: 狂喜的, 狂喜的掌声. The performer received rapturous applause from the audience. 表演者从观众那里得到了狂喜的掌声。

quiz.question: covetous ____
quiz.explanation: 贪婪的, 贪婪的眼睛. He gazed at the treasure with covetous eyes. 他用贪婪的眼睛凝视着宝藏。

quiz.question: unctuous ____
quiz.explanation: 油腔滑调的, 油腔滑调的语气. The salesman spoke in an unctuous tone. 推销员以油腔滑调的语气说话。

quiz.question: tumultuous ________
quiz.explanation: 喧嚣的, 喧嚣的掌声. The crowd erupted in tumultuous applause. 人群爆发出喧嚣的掌声。

quiz.question: contemptuous _____
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑的, 轻蔑的冷笑. He gave them a contemptuous sneer of disgust. 他对他们投以轻蔑的冷笑和厌恶。

quiz.question: sumptuous _____
quiz.explanation: 豪华的, 豪华的盛宴. The king hosted a sumptuous feast for his guests. 国王为他的客人举办了豪华的盛宴。

quiz.question: grievous ______
quiz.explanation: 严重的, 严重的伤害. The accident caused a grievous injury to his spine. 事故对他的脊椎造成了严重的伤害。

quiz.question: pus ______
quiz.explanation: 脓, 充满脓的. The wound became infected and pus-filled. 伤口被感染并充满脓。

quiz.question: ____ detritus
quiz.explanation: 碎屑, 岩石碎屑. Rock detritus accumulated at the base of the cliff. 岩石碎屑在悬崖底部堆积。

quiz.question: ____ sideways
quiz.explanation: 侧面, 侧面看. She would look sideways to avoid eye contact. 她会侧面看以避免眼神接触。

quiz.question: _____ dingbat
quiz.explanation: 笨蛋, 愚蠢的笨蛋. That silly dingbat forgot her keys again. 那个愚蠢的笨蛋又忘了她的钥匙。

quiz.question: ____ polecat
quiz.explanation: 臭鼬, 野生臭鼬. The wild polecat emitted a strong odor. 野生臭鼬散发出强烈的气味。

quiz.question: _____ bleat
quiz.explanation: 咩咩叫, 羊咩咩叫. The sheep would bleat loudly in the pasture. 羊会在牧场上大声咩咩叫。

quiz.question: mistreat _____
quiz.explanation: 虐待, 严重虐待. It is cruel to mistreat animals badly. 严重虐待动物是残忍的。

quiz.question: unseat _____
quiz.explanation: 使落马, 使骑手落马. The wild horse tried to unseat its rider. 野马试图使骑手落马。

quiz.question: _____ nougat
quiz.explanation: 牛轧糖, 耐嚼的牛轧糖. The candy bar contained chewy nougat filling. 这个糖果棒包含耐嚼的牛轧糖馅。

quiz.question: ____ splat
quiz.explanation: 啪嗒声, 响亮的啪嗒声. The tomato hit the wall with a loud splat. 番茄以响亮的啪嗒声撞到墙上。

quiz.question: ____ doormat
quiz.explanation: 门垫, 擦门垫. Please wipe your feet on the doormat. 请在门垫上擦脚。

quiz.question: rowboat ____
quiz.explanation: 划艇, 划艇乘坐. They enjoyed a peaceful rowboat ride on the lake. 他们享受了在湖上宁静的划艇乘坐。

quiz.question: tailcoat ____
quiz.explanation: 燕尾服, 燕尾服套装. The groom wore a formal tailcoat suit. 新郎穿着正式的燕尾服套装。

quiz.question: turncoat _______
quiz.explanation: 叛徒, 变节叛徒. The turncoat betrayed his country for money. 变节叛徒为了钱背叛了自己的国家。

quiz.question: ____ overcoat
quiz.explanation: 大衣, 羊毛大衣. He wore a heavy wool overcoat in winter. 他在冬天穿着厚重的羊毛大衣。

quiz.question: waistcoat ____
quiz.explanation: 背心, 背心马甲. The gentleman wore a waistcoat vest with his suit. 这位绅士穿着背心马甲配西装。

quiz.question: gloat ____
quiz.explanation: 幸灾乐祸, 对...幸灾乐祸. Don't gloat over your opponent's misfortune. 不要对对手的不幸幸灾乐祸。

quiz.question: stoat ___
quiz.explanation: 白鼬, 白鼬皮毛. The stoat's white winter fur provided camouflage. 白鼬的白色冬季皮毛提供了伪装。

quiz.question: _______ brat
quiz.explanation: 小淘气, 被宠坏的小淘气. The spoiled brat threw a tantrum in the store. 被宠坏的小淘气在商店里大发脾气。

quiz.question: _____ prat
quiz.explanation: 傻瓜, 愚蠢的傻瓜. That silly prat made a fool of himself. 那个愚蠢的傻瓜让自己出丑了。

quiz.question: _____ kumquat
quiz.explanation: 金橘, 多汁的金橘. The juicy kumquat had a sweet-tart flavor. 多汁的金橘有甜酸的味道。

quiz.question: squat ____
quiz.explanation: 蹲下, 蹲下. He had to squat down to pick up the coin. 他不得不蹲下捡硬币。

quiz.question: swat ___
quiz.explanation: 拍打, 拍打苍蝇. She used a newspaper to swat the annoying fly. 她用报纸拍打烦人的苍蝇。

quiz.question: _______ artefact
quiz.explanation: 人工制品, 古代人工制品. The museum displayed an ancient artefact from Egypt. 博物馆展示了来自埃及的古代人工制品。

quiz.question: reenact _____
quiz.explanation: 重演, 重演场景. Actors would reenact the famous battle scene. 演员们会重演著名的战斗场景。

quiz.question: abject _______
quiz.explanation: 赤贫的, 赤贫的贫困. The family lived in abject poverty. 这个家庭生活在赤贫的贫困中。

quiz.question: deject _______
quiz.explanation: 沮丧, 沮丧的精神. The bad news would deject everyone's spirits. 坏消息会使每个人的精神沮丧。

quiz.question: interject _______
quiz.explanation: 插话, 插话评论. He would interject comments during the presentation. 他会在演讲中插话评论。

quiz.question: deflect ______
quiz.explanation: 偏转, 偏转攻击. The shield helped deflect the enemy's attack. 盾牌帮助偏转了敌人的攻击。

quiz.question: ____ disrespect
quiz.explanation: 不尊重, 表现不尊重. It is rude to show disrespect to elders. 对长辈表现不尊重是粗鲁的。

quiz.question: _____ intersect
quiz.explanation: 相交, 道路相交. The two main roads intersect at the town square. 两条主干道在镇广场相交。

quiz.question: contradict _________
quiz.explanation: 反驳, 反驳陈述. His actions seemed to contradict his earlier statement. 他的行为似乎反驳了他早先的陈述。

quiz.question: _____ derelict
quiz.explanation: 废弃的, 城市废弃建筑. The urban derelict building was scheduled for demolition. 城市废弃建筑被安排拆除。

quiz.question: inflict ____
quiz.explanation: 施加, 施加痛苦. The torturer would inflict pain on his victims. 施刑者会对受害者施加痛苦。

quiz.question: ___ constrict
quiz.explanation: 收缩, 蟒蛇收缩. The boa would constrict around its prey. 蟒蛇会收缩缠绕猎物。

quiz.question: indistinct _____
quiz.explanation: 模糊的, 模糊的形状. An indistinct shape moved in the fog. 一个模糊的形状在雾中移动。

quiz.question: __ extinct
quiz.explanation: 灭绝, 灭绝. Many species are in danger of going extinct. 许多物种处于灭绝的危险中。

quiz.question: concoct ____
quiz.explanation: 策划, 策划计划. The criminals would concoct an elaborate plan. 罪犯会策划一个详尽的计划。

quiz.question: _____ viaduct
quiz.explanation: 高架桥, 石头高架桥. The ancient stone viaduct carried water to the city. 古老的石头高架桥将水输送到城市。

quiz.question: induct ______
quiz.explanation: 吸纳, 吸纳成员. The organization would induct new members annually. 该组织每年会吸纳新成员。

quiz.question: obstruct _______
quiz.explanation: 妨碍, 妨碍司法. The witness was accused of trying to obstruct justice. 证人被指控试图妨碍司法。

quiz.question: _____ sherbet
quiz.explanation: 果汁冰糕, 水果果汁冰糕. The children enjoyed refreshing fruit sherbet. 孩子们享受清爽的水果果汁冰糕。

quiz.question: dulcet _____
quiz.explanation: 悦耳的, 悦耳的音调. The singer's dulcet tones filled the concert hall. 歌手悦耳的音调充满了音乐厅。

quiz.question: beet ____
quiz.explanation: 甜菜, 甜菜根. Fresh beet root can be roasted or pickled. 新鲜的甜菜根可以烤或腌制。
